Mail.Main.Copyright.other: File Sharing platform proudly powered by Pydio

Mail.Main.Troubleshoot.other: If the {ACTION}-button is not working for you, just copy and paste the URL below into your web browser.

Mail.ResetPassword.Intros.other: A reset password request has been received for your account on {{.Configs.Title}}.

Mail.ResetPassword.Outros.other: If you did not trigger this request, you can safely ignore that. If you keep receiving emails like this, please alert your administrator as it may be a security issue.

Mail.ResetPasswordDone.Subject.other: Your password on {{.Configs.Title}} has been reset

Mail.ResetPasswordDone.Intros.other: Following your reset password request, your password has been successfully reset for {{.Configs.Title}}.

Mail.ResetPasswordDone.Outros.other: If you did not trigger this operation, please alert your administrator immediately as this may be a security issue.

Mail.Digest.Intros.other: Below is a summary of all the notifications your received on {{.Configs.Title}}

Mail.DM.Intros.other: {{.TplData.From}} sent you a message using {{.Configs.Title}} application: {{.TplData.Message}}

Mail.Welcome.Intros.other:
An account has been created for you on {{.Configs.Title}}. 
 Your login is {{.TplData.Login}}{{if .TplData.Password}} and your password is {{.TplData.Password}}. You may change it at first login{{end}}.

Mail.Welcome.Outros.other: {{.Configs.Title}} File Sharing platform is used by your team to efficiently collaborate on documents. We're glad to have you on board!

Mail.Invite.Intros.other:
An account has been created for you by {{.TplData.Inviter}} on {{.Configs.Title}}. 
 Your login is {{.TplData.Login}}{{if .TplData.Password}} and your password is {{.TplData.Password}}. You may change it the first time you log in{{end}}.

Mail.Invite.Outros.other: {{.Configs.Title}} File Sharing platform is used by {{.TplData.Inviter}} team to efficiently collaborate on documents. We're glad to have you on board!

Mail.Cell.Intros.other: {{.TplData.Inviter}} has included you in the cell {{.TplData.Cell}} on {{.Configs.Title}}! You can start sharing files and folders together and collaborate efficiently.

Mail.PublicFile.Subject.other: {{.TplData.Inviter}} is sharing a file with you

Mail.PublicFile.LinkInstructions.other: Click to preview the file in your browser

Mail.PublicFile.Outros.other: {{.Configs.Title}} File Sharing platform is used by {{.TplData.Inviter}} team to efficiently collaborate on documents.

Mail.PublicFolder.Subject.other: {{.TplData.Inviter}} is sharing a folder with you

Mail.PublicFolder.LinkInstructions.other: Click to preview the documents in your browser

Mail.PublicFolder.Outros.other: {{.Configs.Title}} File Sharing platform is used by {{.TplData.Inviter}} team to efficiently collaborate on documents.

Mail.AdminTestMail.Subject.other: {{.Configs.Title}} is sending you a test email

Mail.AdminTestMail.Outros.other: {{.Configs.Title}} File Sharing platform is used by teams to efficiently collaborate on documents.

Mail.Config.From.Description.other: Address to use as default when sending emails. You should use a proper support email instead of no-reply email.

Mail.Config.Queue.Description.other: Persistence layer for storing pending emails

Mail.Config.Mailer.Description.other: Engine used to actually send emails

Mail.Config.NoOp.Label.other: No-Op (enable emails but do not send anything)

Mail.Config.NoOp.Dump.other: Write emails to file for debugging purpose

Mail.Config.Smtp.Host.Description.other: Host of the SMTP server, e.g. smtp.gmail.com

Mail.Config.Smtp.Port.Description.other: Port of the SMTP Server, e.g. 587 (non-secure) or 465 (TLS)

Mail.Config.Smtp.User.Description.other: Username required to connect to the SMTP server

Mail.Config.Smtp.Password.Description.other: Password required to connect to the SMTP server

Mail.Config.Smtp.Security.Description.other: Protocol used for securing connection. Clear is not supported, if required use a custom Sendmail instead.

Mail.Config.Smtp.SkipVerify.Description.other: Disable certificate verification if your SMTP server certificate is self-signed

Mail.Config.Smtp.LocalName.Description.other: SMTP dialer sends 'localhost' in EHLO command by default, use this field to set a custom local name

Mail.Config.SendGrid.ApiKey.Description.other: Api Key provided by SendGrid to connect to the service

Mail.Config.Sendmail.Legend.other: WARNING: Default executable path is /usr/bin/sendmail. If you need to change it, please make sure to set the 'defaults > sendmail' key in your pydio.json configuration file.

Mail.Config.Sendmail.Executable.Descript.other: Full path of the sendmail executable on the server

Mail.Config.Sendmail.Executable.Other.other: Other path (set manually in pydio.json config file)

Mail.Config.FromName.Description.other: Display name to use as default when sending emails.

Mail.Config.FromCtl.Label.other: From/Sender address and name to use

Mail.Config.FromCtl.Description.other: Define which sender address/name to use. If no user email address is configured the default FROM address and name will be used in all cases.

Mail.Config.FromCtlSender.Label.other: Send mail ON BEHALF OF the user

Mail.Config.FromCtlDefault.Label.other: Always send from the Default FROM address/name
